subject: Re: [junit] Junit report xsl stylesheet
msgSnippet: ... The stylesheet for  is in the optional.jar file. Is that what you mean? -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services
messageBody:
jajaguerrero wrote:

> Does anyone know where I can get a stylesheet for the xml output
> generated by running the junit-report task in ant?

The stylesheet for <junit-report> is in the optional.jar file. Is that
what you mean?
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
